thread.title: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides
thread.title_full: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides

title: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides
text: > Top News Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides FILE - In this Sept. 20, 2015 file photo, a broken street lamp is seen along a lane to the sprawling main mansion of the Duke Farms estate in Hillsborough Township, N.J. Clearing the way for the structureâ€™s demolition, the Hillsborough Township Historic Preservation Commission said on Oct. 15, 2015, that the 2893 building had fallen into disrepair and would take $10 million to $20 million to bring it up to code. (AP Photo/Mel Evans, File)
